Reviews.Title: Just Released model, chose over Samsung
Reviews.Author: Carol A. Anderson
Reviews.Content: We had just enough room for this model to fit in home office in crowded area.Fits over the top of the Monitors.We selected this because one it was a new thin model, had a razor sharp display and tons of features. Many lower priced TV are older models with thick chunky look and less features The sellers just want to blow them out the door. Planned on buying a Samsung as picture is usually better on them than an old  Magnavox. But this one looks to be the beginning of better product line from them.  Got to say we were impressed. Granted it is the only TV we own that's not a plasma. Once we hooked it up and tuned it in, we were rewarded with a near perfect display.PROS: new thin style, SRS sound, HDMI ready, PC ready, lots of adjustments for picture,features and sound. I have HP laptop hooked to it an works works great as a monitor, Clean video, decent sound, head phone jacks/external speaker 3.5mm. PC mode has clean text near perfect ,monitor from 4/feet out.We also used for DVD and HDMI out from Asus Transformer Tablet. Plus all the HD and Blue Ray dics and clean picture quality from Direct TV set top box.I have not owned an LED before. You can see the blemishes on other actors faces, a little too well, yuk.Nice overall,monitor & TV.3 HDMI ports, USB, serial port as and RCA inputs. For $258 is is the latest model out for them and it shows'Cons:Smudges easily but that's not uncommon. We have it mounted on wall swing pivot swing bracket.Sound is average so added a little pair of Bose speakers for $69 from Sams and it's sounding really tight with sweet Bass.So far I would say we bought the best $250 LED out there.Signed happy watcher/user.I confess we bought at Sams Club' but they were $60 cheaper then Amazon and they we such a new model, there were no reviews as of yet.We used the $60 to buy the fancy wall bracket and money toward the speakers. Nice to use headphones is you don't wish to bother the other person the other person in the room.Cheers

Reviews.Title: Amazon's misrepresentation of this product.
Reviews.Author: John McGowen "New Tech"
Reviews.Content: I have never felt that Amazon was misguiding it's customers until now.  This add clearly states, "TV Formats Supported: 1080p, 1080i, 720p, 480p, 480i," and this is true however, for the common t.v. consumers they probably don't know what this means.  Fact, this t.v. has a 720p resolution and not 1080p.

Reviews.Title: Everything I need...
Reviews.Author: M. Chang
Reviews.Content: I don't do anything with a television set but WATCH it!  After ordering another brand set, and returning it because of my hearing impairment which did not permit me to hear through the headphone jack...the sound was hardly audible to me, I ordered this Magnavox set. It is wonderful on ALL counts!  The picture is sharp; the color is vivd, and the sound, through the earphone jack, is just what I need. Even the picture on the regular tv choice, is very good, and the HDMI choice is outstanding.  I could not be happier with my purchase. I am grateful to Amazon for permitting me to return my first set, and changing it for this one.  It was a pleasure to work with them. It is too bad that more manufacturers don't include a headphone jack feature. Many people use it; not just the hearing impaired.

Reviews.Title: Worked less than 5 hours
Reviews.Author: Mark S
Reviews.Content: WARNING. 5 weeks ago I received a Magnavox 32" flat panel TV as a gift. I was the first person to open the box. I mounted it on the wall and it has been used exactly 1.75 times. My stepdaughter watched a movie on it three weeks ago. Thursday, she watch 3/4s of a movie when the screen went black. Tried other outlets and it still will not work. I contacted Magnavox customer service and was told that, according to the serial number, the tv was out of warranty. SO, I have a product whose manufacturer does not honor its responsibility to stand behind defective products. Keep this in mind if you are thinking about buying from Magnavox. They told me that I would have to get it repaired. I am just going to throw this worthless product away and just purchase a new TV from a reputable manufacturer.

Reviews.Title: tv plays great.....but i noticed the speakers vibrate when the bass it set on high
Reviews.Author: Brian Gore
Reviews.Content: great picture came factory sealed brand new.... very happy wkith the tv i have it in my bedroom.... hook up was easy

Reviews.Title: Grandson's Birthday present - Great buy
Reviews.Author: KKrull
Reviews.Content: This TV is absolutely fantastic.  A great deal, especially considering the low price.  I would purchase this again if I needed another TV

Reviews.Title: Incredible picture quality.
Reviews.Author: caffeineacademy
Reviews.Content: An incredible picture quality at this low price is unbelievable. So we bought two as gifts, hoping for the best and we werenot disappointed when they arrived.

Reviews.Title: Sweet!!
Reviews.Author: Kalaaz
Reviews.Content: This has met all the needs of my 13 year old and his gaming needs with all his devices ..... 360, wiiu,and Nintendo 64.  He is happy so I am happy!!

Reviews.Title: Great TV!
Reviews.Author: Judith Jenkins
Reviews.Content: I bought this TV when my old 19 year old  TV died. I liked the look and weight of this TV. Magnavox has an excellent reputation and the price was right. This TV fits my room perfectly. Will recommend it to anyone. Judy J.

Reviews.Title: Great 32" LED Flat screen TV
Reviews.Author: maricela
Reviews.Content: This is a great Flat screen for bedroom.  Fairly easy to set up. Great picture quality.  Wish Stand was more adjustable

Reviews.Title: Great TV, easy ordering
Reviews.Author: Kim A. Lynch
Reviews.Content: Bought this TV for my Father that does not get out much any more- he reviewed TVs on line and found this was what he wanted, i then found it on Amazon, placed the order and it is as expected.  The delivery was longer than expected, but that was alright as it was not a Christmas gift.  Easy set up, works great!

Reviews.Title: Pretty Good.
Reviews.Author: Miles Monroe
Reviews.Content: I like it. It has touch buttons which can be good or bad. It looks good. pretty durable  I guess because my cat knocked it over and it was fine.

Reviews.Title: Don't buy THIS TV
Reviews.Author: Kenneth G. Woltz "KG Woltz"
Reviews.Content: Magnavox and Funai Service are manufacturing and avoiding at all cost to service these faulty TV's.After 11 months and only a dozen or so hours of use the TV is dead. No power and the fuse on the main board just blows. Have been told over phone my warranty is out, since when is a 12month wrnty expire in 11 mo? Have 2 phone calls a failed fax and 3 e-mails with no repair yet. BTW: I bought this TV from Sam's Club.

Reviews.Title: Affordable, good quality
Reviews.Author: Bobbie
Reviews.Content: This TV offers a crystal clear picture and excellent volume! The seller shipped it out immediately and it arrived in perfect condition. Makes a perfect sized tv for a 12'x12' room.

Reviews.Title: Good Buy
Reviews.Author: Kyle Herrewig
Reviews.Content: The picture is great and all.My only complaint is some minor damage to the border going around the screen.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Jeannine
Reviews.Content: I like the Magnavox product, it is made here in my home town.I would recommend this to anyone and everyone.The picture and sound are perfect.

Reviews.Title: Recent purchase, excellent so far.
Reviews.Author: M. Elstone "smooth jazz madman"
Reviews.Content: I am a real nube when it comes to electronics, especially tv's.  Recently purchased this television and so far, so excellent.  Great picture, easy to put the base on, simple hookups... couldn't have asked for a beter setup.  Using it for tV and gaming and it ismeeting every demand so far.  Even makes the older systems like Dreamcast, Nintendo, etc... look great.  Highly recommend toeveryone.

Reviews.Title: Good value
Reviews.Author: Paul A Smith
Reviews.Content: Sound is a bit weak; easily remedied with external amp/spkrs - otherwise...as far as reliability, we'll see how long it lasts!

Reviews.Title: Piece of Junk
Reviews.Author: Omar
Reviews.Content: Have had this TV only for 8 months and it just stopped working. I thought it was a good deal at first because of all the great features, all the available connections, good picture quality, and the price.  It was working fine and all of a sudden when I tried to turn it on, it did not turn on and started to make a weird squeal. I even had a it connected to a surge protector for flat screen TVs, and I only used it several days a week for a couple of hours. I think it is not under warranty anymore so I think I'll just have to throw it away.  This is just a piece of trash.  I don't think I will buy Magnavox again.

ProductInfo.Features:
High-Definition Edge-lit LED LCD Display
TV Formats Supported: 1080p, 1080i, 720p, 480p, 480i
3 HDMI Inputs, PC Input via VGA and HDMI Ports
JPEG Photo Viewer
Recognized as the Most Efficient of ENERGY STAR 2012
ProductInfo.Name: Magnavox 32ME402V/F7 32-Inch 60Hz LED-lit TV (Black)
